name: Naruto
description: Naruto, an adolescent ninja, dreams of becoming the Hokage in his village.

name: Your Lie in April
description: Revolves around a piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his.

name: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy, a young man made of rubber, who, inspired by his childhood idol sets off on a journey to proclaim himself the King of the Pirates.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: In the fictitious country of Amestris, two young brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, are bestowed with the gift of alchemy.

name: Food Wars
description: Soma Yukihira battles some of the world's best chefs to prove himself and refine his skills.

name: Horimiya
description: Popular Hori and outcast Miyamura learn about each other's true personalities and become close friends.

name: Jujutsu kaisen
description: Guided by the most powerful of sorcerers, Satoru Gojo, Itadori is admitted to Tokyo Jujutsu High School, an organization that fights the curses.

name: Anohana
description: Menma's friends reunite five years after her death to help her remember and fulfil a wish so she can pass on into the afterlife.

name: Clannad
description: Tomoya Okazaki's life begins to change because of a new friend.

name: Toradora
description: Ryuji Takasu is frustrated at trying to look his best as he enters his second year of high school

name: Haikyuu
description: 2 kids are determined to be like the current volleyball championship's star player.

name: Kuroko's Basketball
description: Taiga Kagami and Tetsuya Kuroko aim to take the Seirin High School basketball team to the very top.
